data.meta_description: THE CHIGNECTO, St. George and Fenwick Mines. Fenwick: Self-published, 1977. Book. Very Good. Stiff Card Wraps. First Edition.. 8vo - over 7¾ - 9¾
data.text:
More Photos

Show Details

Description:

Fenwick: Self-published, 1977. Book. Very Good. Stiff Card Wraps. First Edition.. 8vo - over 7¾ - 9¾" tall. The history of a small Nova Scotia community. Of especial interest to students of local history and genealogy. Unpaginated (105), illustrated w/photographs, drawings, hand-drawn maps. Impressions/scratches, moderate handling wear..
